name.en: Wave Propagation I- Rock Physics Models and Numerical Simulation
name.ch: 震波傳遞I-岩石物理模式與數值模擬

goal.ch:
“以最少的數學 描述震波在不同的岩石物理模型中的傳遞物理現象
利用選課同學自己選擇 不同的 Script 與 電腦語言 進行震波傳遞的數值模擬
選課同學須具備任一種 Matlab, Python, Shell, GMT Scripts 或 電腦程式語言(Fortran, C, C++) 的能力
選課同學想要 學習 各種震波傳遞的數值模擬計算方法“
goal.en:
“Minimum Mathematical Derivations, Emphasis on the ““Physical““ understanding of Wave Propagation Phenomena in All Types of Rock Models
Using Script and Programming Languages to Perform Simulations on Rock Properties and Wave Propagation Phenomena
Students need to have at least some experiences on Matlab or Python or Shell or GMT scripts capability to perform the computations
Students who want to learn various kind of numerical simulation methods are welcome to take this class.“

outline.ch:
“授課內容在 岩石物理模型 部分:
(1) various rock physics models (Isotropic, Anisotropic, Visco-elastic and Poro-elastic media)
(2) Effective Medium Theories
(3) Fracture Medium will tentatively covered if time is permitted
授課內容在 震波傳遞的數值模擬 部分:
(1) Finite Difference Method
(2) Finite Volume Method
(3) Pseudo-spectral Method
(4) Finite-element Method
(5) Hybrid Spectral-element or Low-rank Spectral-Integral Methods“
outline.en:
“Lecture on Rock Physics Model will cover:
(1) various rock physics models (Isotropic, Anisotropic, Visco-elastic and Poro-elastic media)
(2) Effective Medium Theories
(3) Fracture Medium will tentatively covered if time is permitted
Lecture on Numerical Simulation will cover:
(1) Finite Difference Method
(2) Finite Volume Method
(3) Pseudo-spectral Method
(4) Finite-element Method
(5) Hybrid Spectral-element or Low-rank Spectral-Integral Methods“

textbook.ch:
“Computational Seismology: A Practical Introduction, Heiner Igel, University Press, Oxford Scholarship, 2016
Class handouts and Lecture material“
textbook.en:
“Computational Seismology: A Practical Introduction, Heiner Igel, University Press, Oxford Scholarship, 2016
Class handouts and Lecture material“

gradMethod.ch:
“按修課學生程度及需求 並 依老師課堂上公佈為準
期中及/或期末考
電腦作業
學期研究計畫(proposal, presentation and report)“
gradMethod.en:
“Base on students background for their needs and arrangement for each semester
Mid-term and/or Final Examination
Homework Assignments
Term Project (proposal, presentation and report)“
